description: In its new home in Piazza del Duomo, in beautiful San Miniato, in the hands of chef Gilberto Rossi Pepenero continues to serve cuisine that showcases the best ingredients (both meat and fish) from this bountiful region, with delicacies such as excellent truffles featuring on the menu throughout the year. Prepared with a light and modern touch, meals are served in a spacious dining room where the many windows offer glimpses of the town centre.
